channel.title: Jim Karygiannis
channel.description: Recent news about Jim Karygiannis, from openparliament.ca.

item.title: Mentioned by insideTORONTO.com
item.description:
Scarborough MP Karygiannis has new role with federal Liberals
Scarborough-Agincourt MP Jim Karygiannis stepped into a new political role recently as the federal Liberals' new watchdog for Veterans Affairs. In a letter, Karygiannis, who was previously his party's critic on multicultural issues, asked Royal Canadian Legion ...

item.title: Mentioned by Greek Reporter
item.description:
MP Karygiannis View on Skouries Investment
karygiannis After his visit to Skouries, Halkidiki, the Greek-Canadian federal MP, Jim Karygiannis, said he felt wronged as a Greek. Karygiannis, on July 9 in Thessaloniki, appeared to be against the Canadian “El Dorado Gold” investment in the gold mining.

item.title: Mentioned by insideTORONTO.com
item.description:
Scarborough-Agincourt MP Karygiannis celebrating 25 years of riding's creation
Jim Karygiannis has been a Scarborough MP for so long, he is issuing his own medals. The veteran Liberal said the commemorative medals are meant to honour the most deserving people in his Scarborough-Agincourt riding while marking the riding's 25th ...
